verses.text: And there \w went|strong="H3212"\w* a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w*, and \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \add to wife\add* a \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w*.

And the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w conceived|strong="H2029"\w*, and \w bare|strong="H3205"\w* a \w son|strong="H1121"\w*: and when she \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* him that he \add was a\add* \w goodly|strong="H2896"\w* \add child\add*, she \w hid|strong="H6845"\w* him \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w months|strong="H3391"\w*.

And when she \w could|strong="H3201"\w* not \w longer|strong="H5750"\w* \w hide|strong="H6845"\w* him, she \w took|strong="H3947"\w* for him an \w ark|strong="H8392"\w* of \w bulrushes|strong="H1573"\w*, and \w daubed|strong="H2560"\w* it with \w slime|strong="H2564"\w* and with \w pitch|strong="H2203"\w*, and \w put|strong="H7760"\w* the \w child|strong="H3206"\w* therein; and she \w laid|strong="H7760"\w* \add it\add* in the \w flags|strong="H5488"\w* by the \w river’s|strong="H2975"\w* \w brink|strong="H8193"\w*.
And his \w sister|strong="H0269"\w* \w stood|strong="H3320"\w* afar \w off|strong="H7350"\w*, to \w wit|strong="H3045"\w* what would be \w done|strong="H6213"\w* to him.

¶ And the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* came \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to \w wash|strong="H7364"\w* \add herself\add* at the \w river|strong="H2975"\w*; and her \w maidens|strong="H5291"\w* \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* along by the \w river’s|strong="H2975"\w* \w side|strong="H3027"\w*; and when she \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* the \w ark|strong="H8392"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* the \w flags|strong="H5488"\w*, she \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* her \w maid|strong="H0519"\w* to \w fetch|strong="H3947"\w* it.

And when she had \w opened|strong="H6605"\w* \add it\add*, she \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* the \w child|strong="H3206"\w*: and, behold, the \w babe|strong="H5288"\w* \w wept|strong="H1058"\w*. And she had \w compassion|strong="H2550"\w* on him, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, This \add is one\add* of the \w Hebrews’|strong="H5680"\w* \w children|strong="H3206"\w*.

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* his \w sister|strong="H0269"\w* to \w Pharaoh’s|strong="H6547"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, Shall I \w go|strong="H3212"\w* and \w call|strong="H7121"\w* to thee a \w nurse|strong="H3243"\w* of the \w Hebrew|strong="H5680"\w* \w women|strong="H0802"\w*, that she may \w nurse|strong="H3243"\w* the \w child|strong="H3206"\w* for thee?

And \w Pharaoh’s|strong="H6547"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to her, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w*. And the \w maid|strong="H5959"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* and \w called|strong="H7121"\w* the \w child’s|strong="H3206"\w* \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*.

And \w Pharaoh’s|strong="H6547"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto her, \w Take|strong="H3212"\w* this \w child|strong="H3206"\w* \w away|strong="H3212"\w*, and \w nurse|strong="H3243"\w* it for me, and I will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \add thee\add* thy \w wages|strong="H7939"\w*. And the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* the \w child|strong="H3206"\w*, and \w nursed|strong="H5134"\w* it.

And the \w child|strong="H3206"\w* \w grew|strong="H1431"\w*, and she \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* him unto \w Pharaoh’s|strong="H6547"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, and he became her \w son|strong="H1121"\w*. And she \w called|strong="H7121"\w* his \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*: and she \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Because I \w drew|strong="H4871"\w* him out of the \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.\f + \fr 2.10 \ft Moses: that is, Drawn out\f*

¶ And it came to pass in those \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, when \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* was \w grown|strong="H1431"\w*, that he went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* unto his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, and \w looked|strong="H7200"\w* on their \w burdens|strong="H5450"\w*: and he \w spied|strong="H7200"\w* an \w Egyptian|strong="H4713"\w* \w smiting|strong="H5221"\w* an \w Hebrew|strong="H5680"\w*, one of his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*.

And he \w looked|strong="H6437"\w* this \w way|strong="H3541"\w* and that \w way|strong="H3541"\w*, and when he \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* that \add there was\add* no \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, he \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* the \w Egyptian|strong="H4713"\w*, and \w hid|strong="H2934"\w* him in the \w sand|strong="H2344"\w*.

And when he went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* the \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, behold, \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of the \w Hebrews|strong="H5680"\w* \w strove|strong="H5327"\w* together: and he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to him that did the \w wrong|strong="H7563"\w*, Wherefore \w smitest|strong="H5221"\w* thou thy \w fellow|strong="H7453"\w*?

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Who \w made|strong="H7760"\w* \w thee|strong="H0376"\w* a \w prince|strong="H8269"\w* and a \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* over us? \w intendest|strong="H0559"\w* thou to \w kill|strong="H2026"\w* me, as thou \w killedst|strong="H2026"\w* the \w Egyptian|strong="H4713"\w*? And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w feared|strong="H3372"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Surely|strong="H0403"\w* this \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* is \w known|strong="H3045"\w*.\f + \fr 2.14 \ft a prince: Heb. a man, a prince\f*

Now when \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* this \w thing|strong="H1697"\w*, he \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* to \w slay|strong="H2026"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*. But \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w fled|strong="H1272"\w* from the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*, and \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w*: and he sat \w down|strong="H3427"\w* by a \w well|strong="H0875"\w*.

Now the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* of \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w* had \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*: and they \w came|strong="H0935"\w* and \w drew|strong="H1802"\w* \add water\add*, and \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* the \w troughs|strong="H7298"\w* to \w water|strong="H8248"\w* their \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*.\f + \fr 2.16 \ft priest: or, prince\f*

And the \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* and drove them \w away|strong="H1644"\w*: but \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* stood \w up|strong="H6965"\w* and \w helped|strong="H3467"\w* them, and \w watered|strong="H8248"\w* their \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*.

And when they \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Reuel|strong="H7467"\w* their \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w How|strong="H4069"\w* \add is it that\add* ye are \w come|strong="H0935"\w* so \w soon|strong="H4116"\w* to \w day|strong="H3117"\w*?\f + \fr 2.18 \ft Reuel: called also Jethro, or, Jether\f*

And they \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, An \w Egyptian|strong="H4713"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* us out of the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w*, and also \w drew|strong="H1802"\w* \add water\add* \w enough|strong="H1802"\w* for us, and \w watered|strong="H8248"\w* the \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto his \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*, And where \add is\add* he? why \add is\add* it \add that\add* ye have \w left|strong="H5800"\w* the \w man|strong="H0376"\w*? \w call|strong="H7121"\w* him, that he may \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* was \w content|strong="H2974"\w* to \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* with the \w man|strong="H0376"\w*: and he \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w Zipporah|strong="H6855"\w* his \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*.

And she \w bare|strong="H3205"\w* \add him\add* a \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, and he \w called|strong="H7121"\w* his \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w Gershom|strong="H1647"\w*: for he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I have been a \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w* in a \w strange|strong="H5237"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.\f + \fr 2.22 \ft Gershom: that is, A stranger here\f*

¶ And it came to pass in \w process|strong="H1992"\w* of \w time|strong="H3117"\w*, that the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*: and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w sighed|strong="H0584"\w* by reason \w of|strong="H4480"\w* the \w bondage|strong="H5656"\w*, and they \w cried|strong="H2199"\w*, and their \w cry|strong="H7775"\w* came \w up|strong="H5927"\w* unto \w God|strong="H0430"\w* by reason of the \w bondage|strong="H5656"\w*.

And \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* their \w groaning|strong="H5009"\w*, and \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w remembered|strong="H2142"\w* his \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* with \w Abraham|strong="H0085"\w*, with \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w*, and with \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*.

And \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w looked|strong="H7200"\w* upon the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w God|strong="H0430"\w* had \w respect|strong="H3045"\w* unto \add them\add*.\f + \fr 2.25 \ft had…: Heb. knew\f*
